description:
combination of the wide field X'mas tree cluster taken with e-180 and the cone nebula /ngc 2264 captured with RC10. 

Object  :  X'mas tree cluster /ngc 2264
Date : Dec.2019-Jan.2020
Place : Gemini Remote Observatory, Lijiang, Yunnan, China
Telescope : Tak e-180
Mount : Skywatcher EQ8
Camera : ZWO ASI094MC(-15ºC/-10ºC ) 
Exposure: RGB: 180sec x85,  IDAS-V4 :180sec x59  (total 7.2hr)
Guiding : OAG asi174
Image processing : PI ,PS-CC 
detail image:

https://astro-noodle.blogspot.com/2020/08/xmas-tree-cluster-ngc-2264.html?view=flipcard


Object : cone nebula / ngc 2264
Date : Feb.2018-Feb.2019
Place : Gemini Remote Observatory, Lijiang, Yunnan, China
Telescope : GSO RC10 /AP CCDT67 ,
Mount : SkyWatcher EQ8
Camera : SX-H694(-10ºC)
Filter : Astrodon HaRGB
Exposure : 2 panels mosaic
                  fox fur :Rx300sx28,Gx300sx29,Bx300sx34 , Hax1200sx 22 (14.92hr) 
                  cone    : Rx300sx21,Gx300sx28,Bx300sx33 , Hax1200sx 15 (11.83hr) 
Guiding  :Borg 50/ asi174 ,
Processing:  PI、PS-CC

 Detail image :

https://cdn.astrobin.com/thumbs/ZZ5Ath-uSCQG_16536x16536_kWXURFLk.png


https://astro-noodle.blogspot.com/2020/08/cone-nebula-ngc-2264.html?view=flipcard
title: X'mas tree cluster / ngc 2264
